title: René Pellos
text: René Pellos (born René Marcel Pellarin, 22 January 1900, Lyon – 8 April 1998, Cannes) was a French artist, cartoonist and writer who worked in the <a href="Franco-Belgian%20comics">Franco-Belgian bandes dessinées</a> (BD) tradition. He also competed in the <a href="Field%20hockey%20at%20the%201928%20Summer%20Olympics">men's tournament</a> at the <a href="1928%20Summer%20Olympics">1928 Summer Olympics</a>, representing Switzerland.
